list.abs: whether the Annanuki in present time be female or male , generally they take from oneself incessantly and perhaps even to the point of manifesting a disease or other life travesty .不管Anu在现今是男性还是女性，通常他们会不间断地吸食一个人使其甚至陷入疾病或其他生命悲剧。
繁文缛节/red tape反串角色/travesty role反面人物/villainous character
what is the dolphin and whale cause of such travesties upon earth that we have experienced ?在地球上我们所体验的这类悲剧中，我们海豚鲸鱼的带来了什么？
the travesty was a dance where the body burnt into a pile of ashes rather than ascending into a fully formed fourth dimensional vessel .这个悲剧就是身体焚烧成一堆灰烬，而不是提升成一个完整的第四维度管道的舞蹈。
